mapper.insert: insert into fitroot (u_idx, name, id, pw, birthday, tel) values (fit_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{id}, #{pw}, TO_DATE(#{birthday},'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{tel})
mapper.select: select * from fitroot where id = #{id} and pw = #{pw} and status = 'N'

select u_idx,name,id,pw,TO_CHAR(birthday, 'YYYYMMDD') AS birthday,tel,status, age, height, finweight, gender, January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December,water, TO_CHAR(startsleep, 'HH24:MI') AS startsleep, TO_CHAR(endsleep, 'HH24:MI') AS endsleep, sleepcheck from fitroot where u_idx = #{uIdx}
mapper.update: update fitroot set status ='Y' where u_Idx = #{uIdx}

UPDATE fitroot SET age = #{age}, January = #{january}, February = #{february}, March = #{march}, April = #{april}, May = #{may}, June = #{june}, July = #{july}, August = #{august}, September = #{september}, October = #{october}, November = #{november}, December = #{december}, finweight = #{finweight}, gender = #{gender}, height = #{height} WHERE u_Idx = #{uIdx}
mapper.select: select count(*) from fitroot where id = #{id}
